WHG

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • WHG.Block
      • WHG.Wall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class Wall
extends Block
implements Renderable
    This class is used to draw the walls on the screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Wall(double x, double y, double w, double h, javafx.scene.paint.Color col)
      Initialization constructor to construct a wall.

      This method is used to draw the objects on the screen.
      void onCollision(Block block)
      This method does nothing but must be added as this class is an extension of the block class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wall

        public Wall(double x,
            double y,
            double w,
            double h,
            javafx.scene.paint.Color col)
        Initialization constructor to construct a wall. It is just a block in the game so it only needs to make the super call.
        Parameters:
        x - is the x position.
        y - is the y position.
        w - is the width.
        h - is the height.
        col - is the color.

    • Method Detail

      • onCollision

        public void onCollision(Block block)
        This method does nothing but must be added as this class is an extension of the block class.
        Specified by:
        onCollision in class Block
        Parameters:
        block - is the block that would be checking the collision with.

      • draw

        public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas,
                 javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        This method is used to draw the objects on the screen.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        canvas - is the screen in which to draw on.
        color - is the color that will be used for the object.
